reviewText:
The Kidney Strengthening form, takes short time to practice, and it is well explained. It took me some time to figure out what is it that i have done to heal my knee pain. I discovered ,that this is the only Qi gong routine of all what i have been practicing,which cures the pain instantly!,but i must practice it every day.
I thank master Shane Lear for having introduced me to this form,through his dvd.
